# Date.FormatStyle.DateStyle

**Structure**

Type that defines date styles varied in length or components included.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DateStyle
```

## Overview

The exact format depends on the locale. Possible values of date style include [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/omitted], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/numeric], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/abbreviated], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/long], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/DateStyle/complete].

The following code sample shows a variety of date style format results using the `en_US` locale.

```swift
let meetingDate = Date()
meetingDate.formatted(date: .omitted, time: .standard) 
// 9:42:14 AM

meetingDate.formatted(date: .numeric, time: .omitted) 
// 10/17/2020

meetingDate.formatted(date: .abbreviated, time: .omitted)
// Oct 17, 2020

meetingDate.formatted(date: .long, time: .omitted) 
// October 17, 2020

meetingDate.formatted(date: .complete, time: .omitted) 
// Saturday, October 17, 2020

meetingDate.formatted()
// 10/17/2020, 9:42 AM
```

The default date style is `numeric`.

## Modifying a Date Style

- **abbreviated**: A date style with some components abbreviated for space-constrained applications.
- **complete**: A date style with all components represented.
- **long**: A lengthened date style with the full month, day of month, and year components represented.
- **numeric**: A date style with the month, day of month, and year components represented as numeric values.
- **omitted**: A date style with no date-related components represented.

## Comparing Date Styles

- **==(_:_:)**: Returns true if the two `Date` values represent the same point in time.

## Specifying the Date Format

- **day(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day format style.
- **dayOfYear(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day of the year format style.
- **era(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified era format style.
- **month(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified month format style.
- **quarter(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified quarter format style.
- **week(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified week format style.
- **weekday(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified weekday format style.
- **year(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified year format style.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
